Articles.Content:
So, hey...

I was quite busy with all the craft-making and shtufff, but, I'm back.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Anyways, I built myself a helicopter that can airlift light ground vehicles. I have an example here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/t9q4jvkqbc5zeau/Airlift Challenge.sfs?dl=0

Of course, you can replace my helicopter with your own, but it must be able to lift the vehicle in the save off the runway and to the Old Airfield. It is recommended to use AirplanePlus, but you can use stock turbshaft and electric ones as well.

 

If you can do it with as little parts as possible (140 max for AirplanePlus, 400 max for Stock), you will get a place in the leaderboard. 

 

 

 

Go ahead. Do the challenge, and test your copter-building skills.

Hold my Dr. Kepper... Dr. Kraken? What is it? Oh! Kraken Energy Drink: Removes your wings! Hold my Kraken!

 

Edited September 24, 2017 by TheMadKraken2297

(1) The given savefile is focused on an asteriod in deep space

(2) the crafts in it seem to have parts from BDA.

 

So... fix pls?
Or just give us the vehicle to be lifted's craft file instead of a whole save.
